Gastonia.Dallas Graded and High School: Dallas Graded and High School, also known as the Church Street School, is a historic school building located at Dallas, Gaston County, North Carolina. The main school building was built in 1923-1924, and is a two-story, seven bay, "T"-plan Classical Revival style red brick school. It has a flat roof with parapet and features a three-bay porticoed entry pavilion.
